msbt.message: Thanks for stopping by, !I really appreciate the way you encouraged me when I asked for your advice about moving. I might be moving away, but I'll never forget you!

I was hoping we could talk before I left the island, .Your advice meant a lot to me when I was trying to decide whether I should move. I'm a little sad to be leaving, but I'll be hoping for the best for you!
Thanks so much, !You helped me make up my mind when I was unsure about moving. I'm glad we had a chance to talk.I'm leaving the island tomorrow, so wish me luck on my next adventure.

Oh! Hi, .I meant to tell you before now, but I never found the right timeI'm moving to a new island tomorrow. Sorry to spring that on you like this. I'm really glad to have known you. Wish me luck on my new adventure?

Oh, hey there! I've seen you around, but we've never actually met.Funny to finally meet you like this, on my last night on the island. So, yeah Just finishing up my packing. I'm so glad to see will be in good hands!
! Funny that you'd come visit me here nowI decided recently that I'm moving away from .Thing is, I haven't settled on where I'm going to move to
Come to my island!
You'll figure it out.
Oh, ! It's funny that you'd happen to stop by today, of all days! I'm in the middle of packing up to move off Still, I'm not too busy to catch up with you ahead of my move. Make yourself at home, !
Hi there! I'm .Wish we'd met sooner, because I'm just about to move away. It was nice to meet you, though. Now I just need to decide where I'm going to be moving to next

It's a pleasure to meet you! You can call me .Sorry for the mess around here I'm in the middle of a big move. Yep! It's time for a new adventure! I've already worked out all the details with my new island and I'll be on my way tomorrow. But I appreciate you coming by to see me off, .
Thanks, I'm sure that I will. I'm looking forward to it.
I've decided to make a change, so I'm moving to !If you ever find yourself there, please look me up, .I'd love for you to come visit me.
I hope we run into each other again even after I move away.<10_4 /> Now, where should I move to?
Funny how we keep running into each other like this, .I'm really excited to be returning to soon!
Guess what? I'm going to be seeing you around soon!I'm really looking forward moving there, . I've heard great things about your island!
I'm about to move to an island called .If you ever find yourself there, look me up and stop in to visit.
Packing up everything I own has me thinking back on my time here. Guess I'm a little sad to be leaving.
Books are heavy, so I'm packing up those in smaller boxes. My lighter things can go in the bigger boxes This way, I should be able to lift any of the boxes I've packed!
I've made so many memories hereI owe this place one last thorough cleaning before I move out of it.

I have my things all packed up and ready, just waiting for me to decide where I'm going to move to next. I hope it wasn't too hasty of me to pack everything up so soon. I'm just anxious for a new start.There just has to be a place out there where I'll fit in
Come to my island!
You'll find your place.
Oh, wow! I'd love to give that a try.I wonder if the island's currently accepting new residents, thoughMaybe I should try phoning your Resident Services. Thanks so much for making me feel welcome!
Really? It would be great to know someone already who lives there Thanks for inviting me, !I'd better call your Resident Services to see if they'll accept new residents!
Thanks for the encouragement! , I hope you're right.

I have some great news for you! I spoke with your Resident Services, and it turns out that has room for me! I've been approved as a resident!What a relief to have this settled! I'm getting excited just thinking of all the fun we can have there!

In case you were wondering, I just heard from your Resident ServicesRight now, they can't accept any more applications from potential residents, so I can't move there. I'm sorry things didn't work out, but I'm glad I tried, .

I heard from your Resident Services, and the news wasn't goodThere isn't room for any new homes, so it looks like there's no space for me right now on . It's too bad this didn't work out, but at least I gave it a try, right?
With no room for new residents, seems like a real hot spot,
Can you believe there's no space for new homes on ?It must be a great place if it's attracting that many residents.
You know, sometimes these things are all about timing, The situation might have changed in the meantime. Might be worth giving them another call now.
Sure, couldn't hurt.
Nah, I wouldn't bother.
You're probably right, .Optimism's one thing, but I'd hate to bug your Resident Services one too many times and hurt my chances.
